articles.author: Alex Harring
articles.title: Nasdaq 100 futures rise as investors parse latest tech earnings, await jobs data: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks climbed to kick off November as Amazon led big technology stocks into the green and traders looked past a disappointing jobs report.
articles.content:
Stocks climbed Friday to kick off November as Amazon led big technology stocks into the green and traders looked past a disappointing jobs report.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average gained 467 points,… [+1704 chars]
